channel.title: Stupied RSS Feed!!
channel.description: Updates of stuff I've added to my website

description.p: Created a page dedicated to links to other people I like. Please check them out whenever you have the chance; They're all awesome! This is kind of inspired by Spore where you could click around the solar system to select different plants. As a kid I didn't delete any games because I was scared I would run out of planets.

This feed will serve as an alternative to those who can't follow me on neocities or just prefer using rss. This will be updated for any notable changes in the website. Not that anyone cares, but this post wasn't actually made on the April 6 of 2023. That's this website's birthday!
